channel.title: Hello help please cant compile please
channel.description:
how do i fix this problem please help me :|
[URL=http://img143.imageshack.us/i/dddxx.png/][IMG]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/7910/dddxx.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Hello help please cant compile please
item.dc:creator: @masterprivate masterprivate
item.description:
@masterprivate wrote:

@echo off
:menu
title chocolaatje Client Compiler

echo Errors:
echo
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~6jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

this is what it looks like and this is wont work

Read full topic

item.title: Hello help please cant compile please
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

Shouldn’t the path look like this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;
_23 being what version of the JDK you are using? This is the way I use it and it works for me…
